  • Constructor Details

    • SellMonster

      public SellMonster(Player ofcPlayer)
      Create the application. Get the players team as options of monsters to sell. monPicOne sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/220399/monster04 monPicTwo sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/220396/monster02 monPicThree sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/220398/monster05 monPicFour sourced from: https://findicons.com/icon/220397/monster01
      Parameters:
      ofcPlayer - the official player of the game.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initialize the contents of the frame.

    • displayMonster

      public void displayMonster(String num)
      Display monster. Displays the currently selected Monster and its attributes, also displays the sell selected monster button.
      Parameters:
      num - the number of the currently selected Monster.

    • sellSelectedMonster

      public void sellSelectedMonster()
      Sells the currently selected monster by removing Monster from players monster team and increase their gold by the sell back price.
